item.title: Costa Rica Day 3 (Thursday) - Arenal
item.description: I lay awake at night pondering how we were going to see more critters. As it turned out, we didn’t even have to leave the hotel. Tilajari Resort sits right on the bank of the San Carlos River. We woke up to the chattering sounds of birds. As we ambled to breakfast we could see the brown river glimmering just beyond a gently sloping lawn. The fruit section at breakfast was par excellence.
